Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class EditAndAddController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.EditAndAddController
@Controller public class EditAndAddController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with edit and add screens
Since:
1/01/2023
Author:
Dakota Myers drm1022@sru.edu

  • Method Details

    • showContactAddForm

      @GetMapping("/add-contact") public String showContactAddForm(Contacts contact, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds all of the required attributes to the model to render the add contact page
      Parameters:
      contact - holds the new contact being added to the model
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /add/add-contact

    • contactAddForm

      @PostMapping("submit-add-contact") public String contactAddForm(@ModelAttribute("contactForm") Contacts contact, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Receives a contact object by the user and passes it off for validation Once valid it is saved to the contact repository
      Parameters:
